title: Rubbish!
comment: Glitchy. Only the shortcut downloaded with a page prompting me to go to its other apps.

title: Made me an hour late for class
comment: Was working all day yesterday when I installed it. Timed it for 20 minutes today and not only did it NOT go off (thus making me late) but it started repeatedly going off hours later until I uninstalled it. I would hit the off button (the bit with the coffee on it) and it would go off every ten minutes regardless.
app doesn't work

title: Nice idea, but widget is 4x4 and looks like it's 1x2
comment: Also, can't be snoozed nor dismissed. It keeps auto-snoozing by itself. Please fix this.

title: Can't even get it started!
comment: I just installed it and when I touch the widget it takes me to a dumb page that wants me to go look at other stuff the developer has. How about just letting me open the app?? I'm uninstalling. :(

title: I was gonna create my own napping app...
comment: ..but then I found this one. The simplest and quickest way to insta-nap and have phone go to silent mode and come out at the end of your nap. Brilliant. Only one I found that actually does this right!

title: Best
comment: Verrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrry best for me.

title: Love it!
comment: I've been using it for a very long time and I still love it. Being narcoleptic means a lot of naps so the widgets are perfect.

title: Love it
comment: Love widget but this version it take too much space.

title: Its a great
comment: Good i had it for a long time now but on 4.2.2 the widget is too big and takes up 4 spaces fix this please
Works, but must create a widget for each nap length

title: Best Nap App
comment: It is the easiest and fastest to use nap app, as long as you know how widgets work.

title: Perfect
comment: Exactly what I needed

title: Ringtone Changer Would Be Great
comment: Individual widget ringtone customizer would make this pay-worthy.

title: not working
comment: Keeps showing instructions rather than alarm

title: looks promising but
comment: Really doesnt' work.

title: Time to wake up and drink coffee!
comment: Great app for waking up! Short or long naps are great. And the coffee reminder kept me happy!

title: Brilliant
comment: This app is very useful and effecient. Very well coded. Would be nice to have an option to set a nap alarm from the app itself along with an option to do it from widget

title: Love it!
comment: Works brilliant on X10i and Vega
Wah wah. Very good app. Power naps here I come.
Doesn't keep ringing if phone is facedown when alarm goes off.
